nodes.text: An Agbui settlement resided on the Agbui mining world of Hoxim in the Unknown Regions. Haplif of the Agbui presented the settlement to Senior Aide Lakjip as a mining settlement. Lakjip visited the settlement, where Agbui workers allowed her to see the exterior of the facilities, but did not permit her to enter the putative mines and refining complex.

The workers presented Lakjip enough nyix that she believed the world to be rich with the precious metal. Upon her return to Celwis, Lakjip and Councilor Lakuviv plotted to seize the Agbui mining world for the Xodlak family, thereby increasing their family's standing and their own careers.
